explanation: Matchstick, battery, candle, and fuel are all items that are consumed or depleted during their primary use. A hammer is a durable tool that is not consumed in this manner.

category: Characters from Arthur Conan Doyle's Sherlock Holmes Canon
explanation: Sherlock Holmes, Dr. Watson, Mycroft Holmes, and Irene Adler are all central characters from the stories written by Arthur Conan Doyle featuring Sherlock Holmes. Hercule Poirot is a famous fictional detective created by Agatha Christie.
Whisper, Murmur, Hum, and Mutter are all forms of low-volume or subdued vocalizations. Shout is the odd one out as it describes a loud, high-volume vocalization.
